reviewText: This is the perfect gift for a toddler who loves dinosaur train. The DVD has a few fun holiday style episodes, and the buddy figurine is perfect to carry around for a toddler. I wish the box was not so large, it does not look like 1 DVD and character, and my son was sad there was not more in such a large box. As a parent, I think it was perfect, and a perfect gift idea.
the set was just as advertised and was new arrived very quickly. Great set for children. good for young children.
Christmas gift for grandchild.  they loved it.

My 2 year old grandson was so excited when he got this.  His eyes lit up and he squealed "Buddy".  He loves the dvd too. This started the plans for his 3rd birthday party which is this week.  Dinosaur Train theme.
